channel.title: How do controll my npc's coordinates
channel.description: ok at home i wan't to replace the monkeys with my other npc what do i do?

item.title: How do controll my npc's coordinates
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Rickpwns, post:5, topic:272691”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=359965.msg2743778#msg2743778 date=1239514579]
Right Click > Open With… > Notepad
[/quote]
Oh, alright, got it. Could I find an NPC and put his code in the Notepad, and where I’m standing with my character, give him them Coordinates, and compile, and he’ll be standing there?
Sorry if that does not make sense.[/quote]

Yes, he’ll be standing there but wat xx qwertyuiop xx said, you don’t need to compile if you only edit a .cfg, just restart the server.

Read full topic
item.source: How do controll my npc's coordinates

item.title: How do controll my npc's coordinates
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You needn’t compile after making changes to a cfg file unless you’ve also made changes to one or more of your java files.

Read full topic
item.source: How do controll my npc's coordinates
